Name: The Antidote
Description:
A masterfully mixed concentrated cocktail of Inceptium solution.
Activate: Recover 6 health (30 second cooldown)
Passive: Slowly regenerate health over time
Passive: Total health increased by 2 
Passive: Poison potions behave the same as healing potions when collected

Name: A Compass
Description:
An unusual device that never seems to point in any particular direction at all.
Activate: Teleport to a random location (25 second cooldown)
Passive: Increase the area of effect of your incantations by 1 on all sides.

Name: A Journal
Description:
A hand written journal.  As you turn the pages you notice that it begins again at the beginning and never seems to get any closer to the end.
Activate: Teleport back to a spawn location (25 second cooldown)
Passive: Increase the area of effect of your incantations by 1 on all sides.

Name: An Inceptium Ring
Description:
Forged from the strange luminescent green metal inceptium, you can feel the power eminating from it as you study it in your hand.
Activate: Fire a beam of concentrated energy (15 second cooldown)
Passive: Initial weapon rank increased by 2

Name: A Spy Glass
Description:
A beautifully crafted piece of optical equipment.
Activate: Watch the world from afar
Passive: Detect allies, enemies, and treasure in the minimap
Passive: Increase the area of effect of your incantations by 2 on all sides.

Name: A Pocket Watch
Description:
A classic 1950's time piece with the initials J.H. etched into the back cover.
Activate: Slow other players for 6 seconds (45 second cooldown)
Passive: Increase run speed
Passive: Increase jump
Passive: Increase the area of effect of your incantations by 1 on all sides.

Name: The Black Talisman
Description:
A pitch black form, resembling a face, made from shadows staring back at you from the unreachable edge of infinity, truly a disturbing artifact.
Activate: Plunge the world into darkness for 10 seconds (45 second cooldown)
Passive: Slowly regenerate health over time
Passive: Increase the area of effect of your incantations by 1 on all sides.

Name: The Skeleton Key
Description:
A hand carved key, able to open any lock.
Activate: Exit a world without having collected the required treasure
Passive: Bypass the lock on any treasure chest

Name: The Red Talisman
Description:
The furious image of an enraged face, you can sense the intensity within this object as it trembles in your hand.
Activate: Cause an earth quake for 10 seconds (45 second cooldown)
Passive: Slowly regenerate health over time
Passive: Increase the area of effect of your incantations by 1 on all sides.

Name: The White Talisman
Description:
As you study this object, peace, balance and focus consume your senses.
Activate: Heal a large amount of health over 10 seconds (30 second cooldown)
Passive: Slowly regenerate health over time
Passive: Total health increased by 2
Passive: Increase the area of effect of your incantations by 1 on all sides.

Name: A Can of Zapo Cola
Description:
The classic taste of the multiverse's best hyper cola!
Activate: Recover 6 health (30 second cooldown)
Passive: Increase run speed
Passive: Increase jump

Name: The Aetherian Lantern
Description:
An Aetherian artifact, the blazing light within it never burns out.
Activate: Incinerate enemies with a powerful heat ray (20 second cooldown)
Passive: Slowly regenerate health over time
Passive: Maximizes visibility in dark areas

Name: A Repulsing Shield Generator
Description:
Standard issue Multiverse Corps advanced force field technology.
Activate: Generate a force field at the target location for 5 seconds (15 second cooldown)
Passive: Personal rebounding shield

Name: A Higgs Field Amplifier
Description:
Experimental higgs field altering technology, handle with caution!
Activate: Generate a temporary black hole at the target location for 4 seconds (12 second cooldown)
Passive: Reduce knockback applied to the player by a factor of 4

Name: A Gravitronic Nullifier
Description:
Improves mobility by allowing the user to reverse the effects of gravity.
Activate: Reverse the effects of gravity for .25 seconds (12 second cooldown)

Name: Up-Link
Description:
A direct data feed, allows for tracking allies, and treasure, and reveals stealthed players.
Activate: Reveal stealthed players for 15 seconds (30 second cooldown)
Passive: Reveals the entire map on the map screen and allows for tracking allies, enemies and treasure on the minimap
Passive: Increase the area of effect of your incantations by 1 on all sides.

Name: Blast Amulet
Description:
Protects the player from physical damage, with emphasis on explosive damage.
Activate: Ignore all damage caused by explosions for 10 seconds (40 second cooldown)
Passive: Reduces all damage by 20%

Name: Protection Amulet
Description:
Artifact #19 - Protection Amulet (Eldritch)
Protects the player from physical damage.
Activate: Ignore all physical damage for 10 seconds (40 second cooldown)
Passive: Reduces all damage by 20%

Name: Trauma Kit
Description:
Artifact #20 - Trauma Kit (Technology)
Heals all injuries caused by battle.
Activate: Heal to full health (60 second cooldown)
Passive: Total health increased by 2

Name: Inceptium Powered AP
Description:
Artifact #21 - Inceptium Powered AP (Inceptium)
An autonomous peripheral weapon powered by the luminescent green metal, inceptium.
Activate: Position the AP
Passive: Fires a concentrated inceptium projectile at the target location
Passive: Slowly regenerate health over time

Name: Antiverse AP
Description:
An autonomous peripheral weapon comprised of unknown anti-substances.
Activate: Position the AP
Passive: Fires a powerful burst of destructive energy at the target location

Name: Hypertronic AP
Description:
An autonomous peripheral weapon powered by hyper dimensional components.
Activate: Position the AP
Passive: Fires a concentrated hyperdimensional beam, direct hits are more explosive than other beams

Name: Laser AP
Description:
An autonomous peripheral weapon armed with a high powered laser.
Activate: Position the AP
Passive: Rapidly fires a powerful cutting laser beam at the target

Name: Refractive Field Generator
Description:
Generates a refactive field around the user, reducing beam weapon damage substantially.
Activate: Nullifies all beam damage for 10 seconds (40 second cooldown)
Passive: Reduces all beam damage by 50%
Passive: Increases maximum health by 2
Passive: Increase the area of effect of your incantations by 1 on all sides.

Name: Singularity Beam
Description:
An immensely destructive weapon of incredible power.
Activate: Fires a beam that inflicts massive damage at the target location (30 second cooldown)
